briefdescription.para: if this header file is included, will indicate that this designware spi device is used

detaileddescription.para: designware interrupt disabled for control spi irq/fiq
designware interrupt enabled for control spi irq/fiq
Support Designware SPI Slave Mode Support Designware SPI Both Master and Slave Mode

briefdescription.para: detailed description of DesignWare SPI register information

detaileddescription.para: Detailed struct description of DesignWare SPI block register information, implementation of dev_spi_info::spi_regs

parameterdescription.para: spi object pointer
spi working mode (master or slave)
parameter, for master, param is the freq, for slave, param is dfs
Open successfully without any issues
If device was opened before with different parameters, then just increase the opn_cnt and return E_OPNED
Device object is not valid
Device is opened for different mode before, if you want to open it with different mode, you need to fully close it first.
Parameter is not valid
Open settings are not supported
spi object pointer
Close successfully without any issues(including scenario that device is already closed)
Device is still opened, the device opn_cnt decreased by 1
Device object is not valid
spi object pointer
control command code to do specific spi work
parameters used to control spi or return something
Control device successfully
Device is not opened
Device object is not valid or not exists
Parameter is not valid for current control command
Control device failed, due to hardware issues, such as device is disabled
Control device failed, due to different reasons like in transfer state
Control command is not supported or not valid
spi object pointer
pointer to data need to send by spi
length of data to be sent
Byte count that was successfully sent for poll method
Device object is not valid or not exists
Parameter is not valid
Device is still in transfer state
Can't write data to hardware due to hardware issues, such as device is disabled
spi information structure pointer
data that need to read (data must be char type)
data count need to read
data have been read
arguments passed was wrong
spi has something error, nothing can be done
spi was closed, not available for control
other error code not defined here
DEV_SPI_INFO *spi_info_ptr
extra information
